blocks.text:
These changes include:
1. A hamburger menu button that appears only on mobile screens (hidden on md and larger screens)
2. The original menu is now hidden on mobile but visible on md+ screens
3. A mobile menu that slides down when the hamburger is clicked
4. Click handlers to close the mobile menu when a link is clicked
5. Responsive styling using Tailwind's responsive prefixes (md:)

The menu will now stack vertically on mobile devices and appear horizontally on larger screens. The transition between mobile and desktop views occurs at the 'md' breakpoint (768px) in Tailwind.
